data.message: sup Eminem? I just thought I'd leave dis comment. my mom was a pill head too. n bout 7 or 8 yr.s back I was catchin a buzz wit my ex n I slipped down 3 steps. I hit my head on my counter n broke my back at c6. now my mama doesn't even talk to me anymore, cause I'm cripple now! I'm a quadropolicic. so  what I''m sayin is if I' woulda listened to u a lil more, maybe I coulda risen above it and been big just like u! huh?

replies.message: It's not you it sounds like your Mom...    My prayers are with you God bless ❤️
